1.0.1.name: wordpress/keymail-login
1.0.1.description:
Keymail login allows to register users only by email, after registration on the user email comes a link for autorisation.

You can add form registration to your blog using sidebar widgets or shortcode ['kml_login_form']. There is an additional option display all the pages of the blog under the email form. User can choose page on which his will redirect after autorisation.
